actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill pertaining to land conveyances to the regional corporation for the Southeast Alaska Region and the Kodiak Island Region pursuant to the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act.

summary.text: Provides for the conveyance of specified lands to the Regional Corporations for the Southeast Alaska Region and the Kodiak Island Region pursuant to the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act. Grants rights to the subsurface estate therein to the Koniag, Incorporated, Regional Corporation. Permits Koniag, Incorporated, to conduct prospecting and mining operations on its land notwithstanding the future inclusion of such land in a national monument.

titles.title: A bill pertaining to land conveyances to the regional corporation for the Southeast Alaska Region and the Kodiak Island Region pursuant to the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act.
